messages.subject: Re: new e-mail loop for physically challenged hs parents
messages.msgSnippet: Hello everyone! I have just set up the new list at www.coollist.com pchs-parents@coollist.com The list s name is phy-challenged home educators. I can add you
messages.messageBody:
Hello everyone!
I have just set up the new list at www.coollist.com
pchs-parents@...
The list's name is phy-challenged home educators.

I can add you to the users list or you can go to www.coollist.com and
look under
" join a new list " then follow these instructions I copied from their
help page below......

> To join a new mailing list:
>
> 1) Just enter the list name that you want to s*bscribe and your email address.

****This would be pchs-parents@...

> 2) You are then require to check your mail to confirm your s*bscription.
> 3) Click on the link provided in the email message.
> 4) Enter a password so that in future, you can login to Coollist with your email
> address and password to s*bscribe/uns*bscribe to other mailing lists.


Please pass this on to ANY and ALL homeschool related lists that you are
on
( UU homeschooling, Pagan and Christian lists etc ).
Please feel free to post it on homeschooling web sites and message
boards etc.

So far I have 5 confirmed interested people. Volume may be light.
I sent a tesst message and it came back to me just fine.


Debbie (Buzz) Klement
phy-challenged home educators list owner

--
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
The Klement Family "Education is what survives when
Darryl, Debbie, what has been learned has been
Kathleen, Nathan & forgotten"
Samantha B.F. Skinner in "New Scientist".
e-mail- klement@...
Canadian homeschool page: http:\\www.flora.org/homeschool-ca/
Ont. Federation of Teaching Parents: http:\\www.flora.org/oftp/
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

messages.subject: new e-mail loop for physically challenged hs parents
messages.msgSnippet: Due to camaraderie and interest expressed by several people on the Unschooling.com list I have decided to form an e-loop letter (which could become an e-list)
messages.messageBody:
Due to camaraderie and interest expressed by several people on the
Unschooling.com list I have decided to form an e-loop letter (which
could become an e-list) list for hs parents who are challenged
themselves by diseases such as MS, Lupus, Fybromyalgia and any other
form of physically limiting disease or disability (wheel chair bound,
dealing with cancer, kidney disease etc).
The reason for this being that only someone in an identical or similar
situation will have any idea of the trial and tribulations that become
part of our daily lives and affect our hs'ing life as well.

This loop will be a safe place to vent, moan, seek comfort and express
our joys, fears and the triumphs we make over our various obstacles and
stumbling blocks.

This loop will not be moderated but anything hateful or mean spirited
will be not be tolerated.

Nothing will be off topic as everything colours our lives and influences
how we homeschool/unschool.

Please pass this on to anyone in the homeschooling/unschooling community
you think may benefit from such a venue and have them e-mail me
personally if they wish to be included.

I hope to have it up and running by the middle of July.

Debbie Klement (Buzz)
Hamilton, Ontario
--
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
The Klement Family "Education is what survives when
Darryl, Debbie, what has been learned has been
Kathleen, Nathan & forgotten"
Samantha B.F. Skinner in "New Scientist".
